minvakt.controller

Class EmployeeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • minvakt.controller.EmployeeController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/users")
public class EmployeeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller to deal with employees in the database

      • sendNewPassword

        @PutMapping(value="/{email}/getNewPassword")
public boolean sendNewPassword(@PathVariable(value="email")
                                                                             java.lang.String email)
        Sends an email to the specified email-account with a new password for the current user, in case they forget it
        Parameters:
        email - Email accout to send the new password to
        Returns:
        boolean, if the account is in the system or not
